title: CNN Exclusive: New text messages reveal Fox's Hannity advising Trump White House and seeking direction

sentence: "Fox News was racist before #coronavirus, they are racist during coronavirus, and Fox News will be racist after the coronavirus" @JoyAnnReid #AMJoy #MSNBC #SundayMorning pic.twitter.com/0oOQWqkSE8 Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) March 15, 2020 Stolen emails, stolen drone, stolen election .....welcome to the world of #unpresidented Trump https://t.co/NI7vqPV6cu Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) December 18, 2016 Reminder: Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams.https://t.co/ZIKGTd6U1v Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) April 2, 2020 As Guy stated, all this coming from the administration that promised to unite the country.

title: Biden's New Press Secretary Had Some Interesting Things to Say About Fox News

sentence: She also faces questions over other controversial statements she's made, including a false assertion that the 2018 gubernatorial election in Georgia was "stolen" by Republican Brian Kemp.
author: Chris Pandolfo
title: Biden's incoming press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre called Fox News 'racist'

sentence: Back on April 2nd, 2020, she tweeted "Reminder Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams."

title: Greg Gutfeld: Karine Jean-Pierre's tweets matter

author: Monique Beals
title: Kemp holding large lead over Perdue in Georgia governor race: Fox News poll
Fox News Poll: Georgias GOP primary race for governor sees Kemp holding wide lead over Perdue

sentence: A new poll shows Georgia Governor Brian Kemp enjoys a huge lead over his Republican challenger, former Senator David Perdue, ahead of the primary that's due to take place on May 24.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Pence-Backed Kemp Pulls Away From Trump-Endorsed Perdue: GA Primary Poll

sentence: "We're a few days from some big primaries including in Georgia, where the former President Donald Trump has worked hard, really hard, to defeat incumbent Republican Governor Brian Kemp," said anchor John Berman.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Trump is about to 'get embarrassed' in Georgia GOP primary: CNN election analyst
